snippet: Afghanistan’s police force took another severe blow in the attack, which began after midnight Saturday in a strategically important district in Helmand Province.
abstract: Seventeen Afghan police officers are killed when Taliban insurgents attack police base in Helmand province, dealing severe blow to security forces there.

byline.contributor: Taimoor Shah contributed reporting from Kandahar.

lead_paragraph: Afghanistan’s police force took another severe blow in the attack, which began after midnight Saturday in a strategically important district in Helmand Province.

headline.main: Taliban Attack Police Base in Afghanistan, Killing 17
